Anna works for Massive Dynamics A Fortune 500 company, that has pledged to decarbonize their operations and use only renewable energy by 2025.

Ibrahim works for GreenCo A renewable energy developer with
wind, solar, and hydro facilities all
around the world.

negative carbon products…

For the World The simple act of purchasing
certificates from renewable
energy facilities

They have operations across the world. Today, it’s a real challenge to invest in and/or buy renewables in many countries without mature renewable energy markets like the U.S. or Western Europe.

Now, this company
can use Zero, an
open source solution
for purchasing
tokenized
renewables, to solve
this problem.

This allows Anna and others to

Trace and Trust information about their renewable energy investments and purchasing.

Making it

Easy...Transparent...Trustworthy...

For new customers to discover and purchase renewables from their facilities.

Because

Zero also enables renewable energy suppliers and brokers to tap into
new kinds of renewable energy buyers—including a new wave of
cryptocurrency companies looking to decarbonize their operations.

Digitizing “Green Energy”

by tokenizing it on a blockchain is a revolution for the energy industry

as it unlocks new permissionless and green business models, and powers the upcoming age of

Obviously the Crypto world has been the first to understand this potential, as has been shown by the pioneers at Protocol Labs that partnered with us to help them decarbonize the Filecoin network, helping their miners, known as “Storage Providers”, buy Renewable Energy Certificates, in different regions across the globe

Decarbonizing the Filecoin blockchain

In support of the Crypto Climate Accord (CCA), Protocol Labs and Energy Web showcase an open-source solution for decentralized renewable energy purchasing by crypto miners.

Filecoin storage providers purchased verified renewable energy using Energy Web Zero, a public renewable energy search engine

“We are excited to join the Crypto Climate Accord (cryptoclimate.org) and contribute open-source solutions to the crypto sector. We see various opportunities to enable and incentivize Filecoin storage providers to source their electricity from renewables in a verifiable way”

Boosted the
economics of different
renewable energy power plants
